name: Project Stardust (Soul Dusk)
description:
This is a prototype of a melee combat system. It contains a tutorial, free play mode and a boss fight.

Please leave feedback about the game! Feel free ask, discuss or suggest anything related to the prototype in the comments section or at twitter or discord.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SoulDuskGames
Discord: https://discord.gg/Gr3GkBz
